column1: Title: Total monthly contributions by recipient country, (millions)
Source: Development Initiatives based on UN OCHA FTS data
Note: Data excludes funding to Cote d'Ivoire, Mali, Ghana, Nigeria, Senegal, DRC, Guinea-Bissau, Kenya, Cameroon, Burkina Faso, Sudan, Gambia, Benin, CAR, Niger, Togo, Mauritania, Burundi, Malawi
